psitools.spellpiece.operator_compare_to_: Compares block at target position to block in inventory.
psitools.spellpiece.operator_equal_to.de: Compares two numbers. Returns 0 if both are equal, 1 otherwise.
psitools.spellpiece.operator_direction.d: Gets the direction vector relative to the player's facing direction. 0 = Left of the player, 1 = Right.
psitools.spellpiece.trick_recall.desc: Teleports the target to the given position.
psitools.spellpiece.trick_void_block.des: Breaks block at given position and voids drops.
psitools.spellpiece.trick_cast.desc: Casts another spell in the given slot at ~80% of the spell's original psi cost.
psitools.spellpiece.trick_capture.desc: Throws a ball of psi energy that captures the target entity.
psitools.spellpiece.trick_capture_absorb: Absorb the health of the entity in a psi core.
psitools.spellpiece.trick_kill_capture.d: Kills the entity in a core.
psitools.spellpiece.trick_release.desc: Releases any entities that are stored in psi cores.
